data.name: Tank Golfing
data.detailed_description:
A new VR game now in Beta!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1910360/Burial_Stone/


Our new upcoming epic RPG

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1780000/A_Gift_of_War/


Wishlist this weird game!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1796450/Momos_Mansion/


About the Game

Have you ever played golf with a tank? Now you can.
Tank golfing is a new twist on this classic sport.
You try to shoot golf balls with your tank, sounds simple, but requires skill.
Laid back, but not easy.

  • Endless amount of levels
  • Increase difficulty level
  • Always saves your progress, laid back playing.
  • Unique original gameplay
  • Golfing with a tank...
